tool_description: Global phone number verification in a free, fast, reliable JSON API
name: Veriphone
title: Veriphone

api_list.name: verify

optional_parameters.name: default_country
optional_parameters.description: The default country in a 2 letters ISO format. Example: US, RU.  Optional: the country will be infered from the prefix, from this parameter or from the IP address (in that order).

api_list.name: example
api_list.description: Get an example phone number for any country

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: The example number's country in a 2 letters ISO format. Example: US, RU.  Optional: the country will be infered from the IP address if this parameter is absent or invalid.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of example number to return. Values: fixed_line, mobile , premium_rate, shared_cost, toll_free, voip
